channel.title: [PI[ Need help
channel.description: Can some one tell me how do I change the amount of Xp you get when you train levels like combat so it is easy to advance levels?

item.title: [PI[ Need help
item.dc:creator: @Aceron4 Aceron4
item.description:
@Aceron4 wrote:

You can also change the exp rates for non-combat skills by looking for this in your config.java

public static final int WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int MINING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int SMITHING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int FARMING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int FISHING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int AGILITY_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int PRAYER_EXPERIENCE = 20; public static final int RUNECRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int THIEVING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int SLAYER_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int COOKING_EXPERIENCE = 25; public static final int FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE = 25; }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI[ Need help
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

unleashed pvp:

what do I search for?

public static final int MELEE_EXP_RATE = 1500; public static final int RANGE_EXP_RATE = 1500; public static final int MAGIC_EXP_RATE = 1500; public static final double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1;
